entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfo: Support SSD and HDD for DriveType #98675
  • Ensure VN doesn't try to fold relocatable handles #98673
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Unknown reloc type 260 when replaying with -applyDiff #98666
    9.0.0
  • Set ProducesNetCoreAssets property in Publishing.props #98662
  • NativeAOT compile error #98659
  • MetadataLoadContext: Custom attribute enum argument parsing fails for non-core System.Enum-derived type because IsEnum is false #98658
  • [browser][MT] Configure `pthreadPoolInitialSize` and `pthreadPoolInitialSize` in WebAssembly SDK #98652
    9.0.0
  • [mono] set alc collectible #98649
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.2.24113.6] SharpScss.dll causes application crash when converting scss to css #98646
  • AOT之后的软件怎么暴漏一些参数给vmp软件,让vmp自动选择加密的函数 #98645

Closed

  • .NET 8: Non-Breaking Space Being Added in DateTime & TimeOnly ToString Calls on Linux #98664
  • [NativeAOT/arm32] punning test failure in Checked build #98493
  • Start-up performance degradation of.NET 8 in Amazon Linux 2023 over Amazon Linux 2 #96740
  • JsonPropertyName is not inherited from abstract property #98663
  • [browser] Validate that browser template debugging works #95627
    9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] CI failure: MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.CountersTest.Basic_Counters "Category does not exist" #78194
  • [8.0] Failing to build native components #94823
    8.0.x
  • on AOT with Intercepter, Reflection(GetValue) for Virtual Property of zero value causes crush. #96611
    9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Crash in interpreter delegate wrapper when calling AOT:ed virtual delegate target method in mixed mode. #92466
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration #98595
  • WriteAllLinesAsync can throw IOException synchronously somehow #98564
    9.0.0
  • aot #98644

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Add null checks into memcpy/memset helpers" #98681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Wrong IEquatable<T?> interface #98680
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] cleanup cwraps #98679
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix GC boundaries #98678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98677
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Expanded & clarified BerConverter tests #98676
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [browser][MT] cleanup #98672
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for BBJ_SWITCH #98671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect cref's in MetricsBuilderExtensions #98670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Disable building Swift interop tests on macOS with Native AOT #98667
    os-mac-os-x, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Propagate DotNetBuildOrchestrator #98660
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add a unified mechanism to track metadata/metrics about the compilation #98653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve Half conversion test coverage #98642
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix bug in arm64 LazyMachState unwind #98635
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove FluentAssertions reference from ILCompiler.Trimming.Tests.csproj #98674
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #98610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Remove unnecessary assertion from emitOutputInstr #98484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Alternative fix for ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg without LSE #97902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Prevent incorrect constant folding #98561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable Swift interop tests on macOS with Native AOT #98651
    os-mac-os-x, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #98563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] pre-load threads early in dotnet.js #98637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JSType.OneWay -> JSType.DiscardNoWait #98647
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add alpine support in install-native-deps script #98603
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] New jiterpreter backbranch scan pass #98530
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Set setFrameRequired like the other archs #98535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Ensure file-opening exceptions emerge asynchronously from File.Append/WriteAllLinesAsync #98612
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 121.0.6167.184, windows: 121.0.6167.185 #98624
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] try to fix "Invalid atomic access index" - more #98640
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Expand String.EndsWith/MemoryExtensions.EndsWith in JIT #98593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • ObjWriter: Do not generate relocations within .debug_info for DW_AT_type #98597
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
